titles.title: More Job Opportunities and Business Startups for Rural Areas Act
More Job Opportunities and Business Startups for Rural Areas Act
More JOBS for Rural Areas Act
More JOBS for Rural Areas Act
To amend the Investment Company Act of 1940 to require a report on improving access to capital in rural areas for small businesses and qualifying venture capital funds.
More JOBS for Rural Areas Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
